translations.cli.short_description: CLI - Command line tool for SDK
translations.cli.long_description:
CLI is a powerful tool for managing resources in SDK.
To get started, use 'cli --help' to see all available commands.
translations.cli.help_more_info: Use "%s [command] --help" for more information about a command.
translations.cli.panic_help: Please help us improve by sending the error report to our repository:
translations.cli.i18n.list.title: Available languages
translations.cli.i18n.list.use_set: Use 'mgc i18n set <code>' to change the language.
translations.cli.i18n.set.note: To persist this configuration, you can:
translations.cli.i18n.set.note_3: 2. Use the --lang flag in each command:
translations.cli.auth.short: Actions with ID Magalu to log in, API Keys, refresh tokens, change tenants and others
translations.cli.auth.long: The authentication credentials set here will be used as a basis for a variety of HTTP requests using the MgcSDK. Authentication is done via Magalu Cloud account (Object Storage requires special keys, refer to it for more info)
translations.cli.auth.logout.long: Ends the current session by removing the token used by Magalu Cloud for authentication
translations.cli.auth.access_token.short: Retrieve the access token used in the APIs
translations.cli.auth.access_token.long: Retrieves the access token used in the APIs, validates its current status, and automatically refreshes it when needed, ensuring the returned token is always up-to-date and ready for use
translations.cli.auth.tenant.long: Tenants work like sub-accounts. You may have more than one Tenant under your Magalu Cloud account and they each store their data separately, but are billed under the same account
translations.cli.auth.tenant.current.long: The active tenant is used for all HTTP requests sent to Magalu Cloud
translations.cli.auth.tenant.list.short: List all available tenants for the current login
translations.cli.auth.tenant.list.long: Returns a list of all tenants available for the current login, including UUID, name, email, management status (isManaged), and delegation status (isDelegated)
translations.cli.auth.tenant.set.short: Set the active tenant to be used for all subsequent requests
translations.cli.auth.tenant.set.long: Sets the active tenant for all subsequent requests by providing the desired tenant's UUID
translations.cli.auth.tenant.set.observation: If you have an API Key set, changing the tenant will unset it
translations.cli.auth.tenant.select.short: Interactively list, select, and set the active tenant
translations.cli.auth.tenant.select.long: Runs an interactive flow that lists available tenants, prompts the user to select one, and then sets the chosen tenant as active
